svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 60px; margin-left: 261px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Part I
Data Foundations
NGS • Datasets
GWAS • Classical VEP

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 200px; margin-left: 101px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Part II
Architectures
Representations
CNNs • Attention

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 210px; margin-left: 421px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Part III
Learning & Evaluation
Pretraining • Transfer
Adaptation • Benchmarks
Evaluation • Confounding

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 370px; margin-left: 241px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
FM Principles
DNA-LMs • Protein-LMs
Regulatory • VEP-FMs

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 510px; margin-left: 21px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Part V
Cellular Context
RNA • Single-Cell
3D Genome • Networks
Multi-omics

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 510px; margin-left: 251px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Part VI
Responsible Deployment
Uncertainty
Interpretability
Causality • Regulation

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(208, 206, 226), rgb(59, 57, 74)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(86, 81, 126), rgb(164, 160, 198));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 510px; margin-left: 501px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Part VII
Applications & Frontiers
Clinical Risk
Rare Disease • Drug Discovery
Design • Frontiers

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));
